Contents of toolbar

  1. Left side:
    • Window pop up on hover Line (5-22).
    • Slider on hover Line (27-54).
  2. Middle side:
    • Horizontal icon scroller Line (59-94).
  3. Right side:
    • Slider on hover Line (99-126).
